
Hackers intercepted two RSA-encrypted messages from different sites with a shared prime. Can you recover the secret from: ciphertext1: 2954029846319505988028200359084761955994021759376475527394865751564539013444177112343019775206791251681096333069695909846636521479784518908166381117600338, ciphertext2: 160954194894385376636195655453608836819573858177361079372960269616999788849765891996615267406760248295785815427532121621027516792295181831395408566620504


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6015106607002086142165674794075142592418641693248525933362348391803944093327979880947691299126495291701638660468028855562202909067342756206428499922925551, n2=4906452927080803029210198117117308662153726455612849705867622158016910329942079320015999400819453697437948350642644245616189869049355680605850641845381117, e=2291232775536082148960321206021790191208716392106079501059247220449496216206097638587982343718615239323106945059120266078667766631507289007942912180523877

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{nmb0rn17}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 2954029846319505988028200359084761955994021759376475527394865751564539013444177112343019775206791251681096333069695909846636521479784518908166381117600338, ciphertext2: 160954194894385376636195655453608836819573858177361079372960269616999788849765891996615267406760248295785815427532121621027516792295181831395408566620504
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6015106607002086142165674794075142592418641693248525933362348391803944093327979880947691299126495291701638660468028855562202909067342756206428499922925551, n2=4906452927080803029210198117117308662153726455612849705867622158016910329942079320015999400819453697437948350642644245616189869049355680605850641845381117, e=2291232775536082148960321206021790191208716392106079501059247220449496216206097638587982343718615239323106945059120266078667766631507289007942912180523877
extra_info: p=71174575832400734556511012287281147216411646502708790162147934368091862649869, q=84512012002238513860513545233166261237642715836336160423066787985254249171179, r=58056278756573009343615808654382828169348350709269450854511792958323888036023, φ(n1)=6015106607002086142165674794075142592418641693248525933362348391803944093327824194359856659878078267144118213059574801199863864116757541484075153811104504, φ(n2)=4906452927080803029210198117117308662153726455612849705867622158016910329941936751725240589296249568084060801553237254549644263438078102024907063708173916
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
